description: Creative Enzymes provides modified horseradish peroxidase (HRP), alkaline phosphatase (AP), and other instrumental enzymes for easy conjugation to proteins and peptides for various immunoassays and related applications. We also have extensive experience to develop CLEAs for improved properties of enzymes. We provide services to analyze the structures of enzyme complexes after conjugation and purification.
name: Enzyme Conjugation with Proteins Peptides
